page.title: 11Remodelling our Estates
page.content: Some say that problems are lessening now, It's not so bad at all. The foundations were laid, And people were paid... Whatever the future holds for Croxteth, Will it ever change ? For good or evil, better or worse, {Will it change ?} Claire Tweedle {REMODELLING OUR ESTATE} People in Stockbridge Village say there should be parks, places for children to play, facilities for mums and babies and pre-school children. There should be more shops and libra- ries, but when the shop-keepers try to improve standards the vandals destroy their good work. There is a weekly disco, but some spoil it for others. Lesley Johnson
